name: gmob.moda.backend
description: Backend do projeto Esquadr√£o da Moda

scripts.create-api: claudia create --version dev --config api-config.json --region us-east-1 --handler lambda.handler --deploy-proxy-api --name gmob-fashion-squad --set-env-from-json env/development.json --profile gmob-devops
scripts.deploy: claudia set-version --version dev --config api-config.json --set-env-from-json env/development.json --profile gmob-devops
scripts.release: claudia set-version --version prod --config api-config.json --set-env-from-json env/production.json --profile gmob-devops
